id: The Cozy Life Ultimate Dashboard - Notion Template
name: The Cozy Life Ultimate Dashboard - Notion Template
description: A complete dashboard to organize life.Our brand-new Notion dashboard is ready! We came up with a robust (and cozy!) life dashboard to help people keep track of the day-to-day. Check out the video below to see an in-depth preview.What's a Notion dashboard exactly?A dashboard is quite a bit heftier than a normal template. It's a one-stop shop for anything you want to write down, document, track, etc. They usually also have a fun theme that runs throughout the entire dashboard making the design coh
features: Space for small and big goals; Recipe book and meal prep; Budget tracker to see where your money goes; Habit Tracker; Travel Planner -  a no-nonsense travel planner with a simple itinerary and date tracking; Filing cabinet for important documents; Contact book; Personal Journal to write your musings; Watch List for TV and Movies with currently watching list; Reading List that includes book tally + completed books section
